I was kinda hoping to see the Ghost Dawg, Forest Whitaker, in this romantic comedy, but I guess Bill Murray will do. Check out the trailer.

The wait for news is over. Konfabulator announced that they've been bought by Yahoo! and will be changing their name to "Yahoo! Widgets". Looks like Google just lost a little more of their edge.
